comment: This is a duplicated course given to basically all education majors, meaning that there are a lot of professors teaching the same exact course, content, and rubrics. Take ANYONE else. She is an extremely tough grader who cares about more assignments than others with no warning. The kind of support you'll receive is "look through the content again."

This was a ONE hour credit course that I spent 3-5 hours a week working on. I am an all A student who is graduating Magna Cum Laude. When I say this woman is horrible, she is AWFUL. I'm an English Ed major who still was making 70s on papers because her instructions weren't clear. She is THE toughest grader I've ever experienced. Take anyone else!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: SUPER unclear about directions and deadlines. Takes forever to grade and does not give clear feedback. DO NOT take. If Prof. Hicks is available for this course, TAKE HER instead.
inflexible stickler on unimportant factors doesn't provide guidance until giving feedback through grading (at which point, it's too late to make a difference)
